data.title: Disney's The Aristocats Kids Studio Wayne
data.meta_description: Disney's The Aristocats Kids Student Performances through Studio Wayne in Waynesboro, VA.
data.text:
JP Anderson

Introducing JP Anderson who is playing Napoleon in Aristocats KIDS! JP is going into the 7th grade at Stuart Hall. Before Aristocats, JP was a part of Frozen Jr. through Waynesboro City Schools. In his free time, JP enjoys sleeping; playing video games and with Legos. JPâs ideal pets are Cats. JP wants our audience to know that he enjoys the beach.

Lauren Anderson

Introducing Lauren Anderson who is playing Madame in Aristocats KIDS! Lauren is going into the 6th grade at Kate Collins Middle School. Before Aristocats, Lauren was a part of Frozen Jr. through Waynesboro City Schools. In her free time, Lauren enjoys crafting and playing games. Laurens ideal pet is her dog, Sharkey. Lauren wants our audience to know that she does not perform often because of stage fright. This is one of her first times speaking and singing alone on stage.

Finley Buchholz

Introducing Finley Buchholz, who is part of the Dog Ensemble in Aristocats KIDS! Finley is going into the 4th grade at Churchville Elementary. This is Finleyâs first show! In his free time, Finley enjoys playing with his neighbors. Finleyâs ideal pet is Count Rugen, his polydactyl cat. Finley wants our audience to know that heâs really looked forward to being in theater. His older brothersâand even his momâhave been in theater. Heâs so glad he can finally play!

Clara Carney

Introducing Clara Carney who is part of the Dog Ensemble in Aristocats KIDS! Isabella is going into the 6th grade and is homeschooled. Before Aristocats, Clara played Shenzei in The Lion King. In her free time, Clara enjoys playing outside, coding, drawing and ballet. Claraâs ideal pets are Cats and Dogs.

Lilias Cole

Introducing Lilias Cole who is playing in Aristocats KIDS! Lilias is going into the 7th grade and is Homeschooled. Before Aristocats, Lilias was in The Lion King Kids. In her free time, Lilias enjoys dancing, reading, crafts, and music. Liliasâ ideal pet is all of them.

Nora Cramer

Introducing Nora Cramer who is playing Scat Cat in Aristocats KIDS! Violet is going into the 7th Grade at Stuarts Draft Middle School. Before Aristocats, Nora loved being Rafiki Â in The Lion King kids. In her free time, Nora enjoys drawing, dancing, and playing piano. Noraâs ideal pet is a gray bunny with floppy ears. Nora wants our audience to know that if she could be anywhere, she would probably be at The Wayne Theatre.

Emily Edson

Introducing Emily Edson who is playing Ssoise in Aristocats KIDS! Emily is going into the 5th grade. Before Aristocats, Emily played Penny in 101 Dalmatians. In her free time, Emily enjoys playing guitar and ballet. Emilyâs ideal pets are Llamas. Emily wants our audience to know that she loves performing at Wayne Theatre!

Norah Edson

Introducing Norah Edson who is playing Quick Cat in Aristocats KIDS! Norah is going into the 3rd grade. This is Norahâs first show! In her free time, Norah enjoys swimming, playing games, and being with my friends. She also enjoys playing the piano. Norahâs ideal pets are Dogs. Norah wants our audience to know that she loves creating new voice characters to entertain her family!

Alia Gary

Introducing Alia Gary who is playing Duchess in Aristocats KIDS! Alia is going into the 7th grade at Henley Middle School. Before Aristocats, Alia played Nala in The Lion King Kids! In her free time, Alia enjoys doing karaoke with her family and friends, reading murder mysteries, and doing art. Aliaâs ideal pets are dogs and cats. Alia wants our audience to know that sheâs loved the movie The Aristocats since she was little and is so excited to be in the musical version! She thinks itâs 100 times better when sheâs doing it with such an amazing group of people. Please enjoy the show!

Katherine Harwood

Introducing Katherine Harwood, who is playing Tat Cat in Aristocats KIDS! Katherine is Homeschooled and is going into the 4th grade. Before Aristocats, Katherine was Whitney Wilson in The Elevator Family. In her free time, Katherine enjoys singing, puzzles, bike riding, planting flowers, and reading. Katherineâs ideal pet is a Skunk. Katherine wants the audience to know that she was born in Ohio and has lived in 5 states. She loves drama and dancing and enjoys making her own videos. She also likes learning how much money professional actors/actresses make. On her familyâs 35 acres of land, they have a cabin that is over 200 years old. She likes exploding marshmallows in the microwave and then eating them. She is the middle of five kids.

Lilly Juarez

Introducing Lilly Juarez who is playing Roquefort in Aristocats KIDS! Lilly is going into the 5th grade at Brownsville Elementary School. Before Aristocats, Lilly played Mama Ogre in Shrek! In her free time, Lilly enjoys reading, listening to music, and playing board games. Lillyâs ideal pet is a Golden Doodle! Lilly wants the audience to know that sheâs really excited to be in this show!

Maddox Knorr

Introducing Maddox Knorr who is playing Berlioz in Aristocats KIDS! Maddox is going into the 5th grade at River Bend Elementary School. Before Aristocats, Maddox played Ralphie in A Christmas Story. In his free time, Maddox enjoys singing, hanging out with friends, and swimming on The Massanutten Marlins. Maddoxâs ideal pets are puppies. Maddox wants our audience to know that this show is going to be Purr-fect!!

Colin Larson

Introducing Colin Larson who is playing Mad Cat in Aristocats KIDS! Colin is going into the 6th grade and is homeschooled. Before Aristocats, Colin was in The Jungle Book. In his free time, Colin enjoys reading, video games, swimming, and hanging out with friends. Colinâs ideal pet is his dog, Wren. Colin wants our audience to know that he loves to build legos, and that he is a Spider-Man enthusiast.

Eliana Lessley

Introducing Eliana Lessley who is playing Ameilia Gabble in Aristocats KIDS! Eliana is going into the 7th grade at Shelburne Middle School. Before Aristocats, Eliana was in Matilda. In her free time, Eliana enjoys reading, eating, and sleeping. Elianaâs ideal pets are cats. Eliana wants our audience to know that this is her second show with the Wayne.

Myla Lineweaver

Introducing Myla Lineweaver, who is playing Tacky Cat in Aristocats KIDS! Myla is going into the 5th grade at North River Elementary. Before Aristocats, Myla played Snake Coil in The Jungle Book KIDS! In her free time, Myla enjoys reading and spending time in her room with her cat. Mylaâs ideal pet is a cat! Myla wants our audience to know that she fosters kittens and cats!

Isabella Lupino

Introducing Isabella Lupino who is playing Pep Cat. Isabella is going into the 6th grade at Stuarts Draft Middle School. This is Isabellaâs first show! In her free time, Isabella enjoys Karate. Isabellaâs ideal pet is a Guinea Pig. Isabella wants our audience to know that she likes to build forts.

Zoey Mahoney

Introducing Zoey Mahoney who is part of our Dog Ensemble in Aristocats KIDS! Zoey is going into the 4th grade at Westwood Elementary. Before Aristocats, Zoey was in The Jungle Book Kids. In her free time, Zoey enjoys softball, arts and crafts, and singing. Zoeyâs ideal pets are a Dog named Ivy and a Hamster named Buttercup. Zoey wants the audience to know that she loves the outdoors.

Levi Marshall

Introducing Levi Marshall who is playing Vichey in Aristocats KIDS! Levi is going into the 5th grade at Stump Elementary. Before Aristocats, Levi was a part of A Christmas Story. In his free time, Levi enjoys helping backstage and playing outside. Leviâs ideal pets are Ferrets and his dog, Dan. Levi wants our audience to know that he likes old cars.

Isla McPhail

Introducing Isla McPhail, who is playing Marie in Aristocats KIDS! Isla is going into the 4th grade at Westwood Elementary. Before Aristocats, Isla was involved with The Jungle Book at The Wayne Theatre. In her free time, Isla enjoys dancing! She loves tap, jazz, and ballet. Islaâs ideal pet would be a cat.

Aniya Mims

Introducing Aniya Mims, who is playing Thomas OâMalley in Aristocats KIDS! Aniya is going into the 7th grade at Henley Middle School. Before Aristocats, Aniya played Timon in The Lion King KIDS! In her free time, Aniya enjoys reading, playing basketball, watching movies, and swimming. Aniyaâs ideal pet is an Elephant. Aniya wants our audience to know that she is fun-loving and charismatic.

Adelai Mosley

Introducing Adelai Mosley, who is playing Abigail Gabble in Aristocats KIDS! Adelai is going into the 4th grade at Grace Christian. This is Adelaiâs first show! In her free time, Adelai enjoys creating art, baking, and playing with her friends. Adelaiâs ideal pet is a Scottish Fold Cat. Adelai wants the audience to know that at 10 years old sheâs lived in 5 different states and she loves to travel!

Liam Murphy-Buchholz

Introducing Liam Murphy-Buchholz who is playing Edgar in Aristocats KIDS! Liam is going into the 8th grade at Beverly Manor Middle School. Before Aristocats, Liam was in A Christmas Story as Schwartz. In his free time, Liam enjoys learning about airplanes. He wants to be a pilot when he grows up. Liamâs ideal pets are his barn kittens. Liam wants our audience to know that he has a lot of brothers...5 of them...and heâs in the middle. Heâs Liam in the middle.

Violet Nesbit

Introducing Violet Nesbit who is playing Hep Cat in Aristocats KIDS! Violet is going into the 4th Grade at Westwood Hills Elementary School. Before Aristocats, Violet played Young Nala in The Lion King. In her free time, Violet enjoys having fun! Violetâs ideal pet is an otter. Violet wants our audience to know that she hopes to be a professional actor when she grows up!

Elinor Priddy

Introducing Elinor Priddy, who is Bad Cat in Aristocats KIDS! Elinor is going into the 6th grade at Kate Collins Middle School. Before Aristocats KIDS, Elinor played Zazu in Lion King Kids. In her free time, Elinor enjoys Basketball, singing, and she also does scouts. Elinorâs ideal pet would be a Guinea Pig.

Tessa Priddy

Introducing Tessa Priddy, who is part of the Alleycat Ensemble in Aristocats KIDS! Tessa is going into the 4th grade at Westwood Elementary School. Before Aristocats KIDS, Tessa was a part of 101 Dalmatians. In her free time, Tessa enjoys Basketball, softball, and going to the Frontier Culture Museum Camp. Tessaâs ideal pet would be her two dogs, Luka and Hatch.

Anthea Shepherd

Introducing Anthea Shepherd, who is playing Slick Cat in the Aristocats! Anthea is going into the 5th grade at Westwood Hills Elementary. Before Aristocats KIDS, Anthea was a part of the Children's choir in Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat. In her free time, Anthea enjoys ballet, singing, drawing and reading comic books. Antheaâs ideal pet would be a cat. Anthea wants our audience to know that she is a cool cat.

Asher Shepherd

Introducing Asher Shepherd, who is a part of our Dog Ensemble in Aristocats KIDS! Asher is going into the 7th grade at Kate Collins Middle School. Before Aristocats KIDS, Asher played Mysterious Man in Into the Woods. In his free time, Asher enjoys playing video games, reading, and soccer. Cats and Dogs are tied for Asherâs ideal pet. Asher wants our audience to know that he is funny.

Petra Shepherd

Introducing Petra Shepherd, who is a part of our Alley Cat Ensemble in Aristocats KIDS! Petra is going into the 3rd grade at Westwood Hills Elementary. Before Aristocats KIDS, Petra was a part of the Children's choir in Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat. In her free time, Petra enjoys ballet, reading, basketball, and playing. Petraâs ideal pet would be a Golden Retriever. Petra wants our audience to know that she is very friendly.

Cora Stout

Introducing Cora Stout who is playing Toulouse in Aristocats KIDS! Cora is going into the 4th grade at Cassell Elementary School. Before Aristocats, Cora played Randy in A Christmas Story. In her free time, Cora enjoys talking with her friends, singing, and playing in her pool. Coraâs ideal pet is a ferret. Cora would like our audience to know that she is creative and loves Theatre.
